short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get daily salah times for your area

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will remind you daily Salah (Namaz) time.

This extension is free of cost to use.

This extension doesn't collect or store any of user's data anywhere. Only extension level settings/configurations will be stored in chrome storage itself (not outside). 
User will be prompted to allow location service. This will be used to determine user's current location and this will used in application to get the location based Salah (Namaz) time.
If user don't want to allow location, user need to enter latitude and longitude manually in setting page.
